snippet: Reputation.com is building a business around helping people store personal data about themselves as a way to manage their online reputations.
abstract: Reputation.com is building a business around helping people store personal data about themselves as a way to manage their online reputations.
lead_paragraph: Reputation.com is building a business around helping people store personal data about themselves as a way to manage their online reputations, Natasha Singer writes in The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: A Vault for Taking Charge of Your Online Life
